entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023
